item.title: Need a little help with a code ~ 100 errors
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

else if (NPCID == 522) {
if(playerLevel[6] < 99)
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 800;
}
else {
sendMessage("I think he is busy");
}
}

item.source: Need a little help with a code ~ 100 errors

item.title: Need a little help with a code ~ 100 errors
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

Oops, Sorry I see whats wrong. Heres fixed:

[quote=“JRealm, post:2, topic:195122”]Under the last bracket you have there. It should be like this:

else if (NPCID == 522) {
if(playerLevel[6] <= 99)
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 800;
}
else {
sendMessage("I think he is busy");
}
}

Look, You got 2 If Statements there. As you see you closed the “if(playerLevel[6] <= 99) {” statement with a bracket. But you need to
close the another if statement to. Thats why it gives you 100 errors.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Need a little help with a code ~ 100 errors
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

Under the last bracket you have there. It should be like this:

else if (NPCID == 522) {
if(playerLevel[6] <= 99)
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 800;
}
else
sendMessage("I think he is busy");
}
}

Look, You got 2 If Statements there. As you see you closed the “if(playerLevel[6] <= 99) {” statement with a bracket. But you need to
close the another if statement to. Thats why it gives you 100 errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help with a code ~ 100 errors

item.title: Need a little help with a code ~ 100 errors
item.dc:creator: @starhooper starhooper
item.description:
@starhooper wrote:

Hey guys, im currently trying to add skillmasters to my server that will give you, for example a magic skillcape if you have 99 magic.
Here is my code,

else if (NPCID == 522) {
if(playerLevel[6] <= 99)
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
NpcWanneTalk = 800;
}
else
sendMessage("I think he is busy");
}

When i compile i get 100 errors, am i missing any brackets?

Could really do with the help

~ Harry[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2008, 10:17:59 AM[/size][hr]Anybody know?

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help with a code ~ 100 errors
